#summary Fixtures for platforms

= Introduction =
Here are a list of the information necessary for some platforms. The list will grow as more and more platforms are tested with SocialConnect.


== Facebook ==
 * Name: Facebook
 * API url: http://api.facebook.com/restserver.php
 * API version: 1.0
 * Login url: http://www.facebook.com/login.php
 * API key: 
 * API secret: 
 * Support: people, groups, activities push, notifications 


== MySpace ==
 * Name: MySpace
 * API url: http://api.myspace.com/v2/
 * Consumer key:
 * Consumer secret:
 * Request token url: http://api.myspace.com/request_token
 * Authorization token url: http://api.myspace.com/authorize
 * Access token url: http://api.myspace.com/access_token
 * Signature method: HMAC_SHA1
 * Token validity: 86400
 * Support: people
 * Fields correction: diplayName => nickname, birthday => dateOfBirth
